description: Erection of three-storey one bedroom dwellinghouse with roof terrace.
decision_conditions: The proposed development, by reason of its detailed design, position and location would result in an obtrusive and incompatible form of development which adversely disrupts the established grain of the area and would consequently fail to preserve or enhance terrace within which the property is located and the character and appearance of the surrounding conservation area. As such the proposed development is contrary to policies D4 (Delivering Good Design), D6 (Housing Quality and Standards) and HC1 (Heritage Conservation and Growth) of the London Plan 2021, policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character), LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) and LP17 (Housing Design) of the Local Plan 2033 and the guidance contained within Hackney Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD 2009.

The proposed development, by reason of poor layout, single aspect design and provision of basement living areas which would provide inadequate daylight and ventilation, would result in the provision of an unacceptable standard of residential accommodation. As such the proposed development is contrary to policy D6 (Housing Quality and Standards) of London Plan 2021 and policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) and LP17 (Housing Design) of the Local Plan 2033 and the guidance contained within the Mayor of London's Housing SPG.

The proposed development, by reason of its detailed design and position, would result in large amounts of light pollution which would result in an unacceptable adverse impact on the amenity of the neighbouring occupiers. As such the proposed development is contrary to policies D4 (Delivering Good Design) and D6 (Housing Quality and Standards) of the London Plan 2021 and policy LP2 (Development and Amenity) of the Local Plan 2033 and the guidance contained within Hackney Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD 2009.

The proposed development, by reason of not providing step free access, fails to provide a fully inclusive and accessible layout and is considered to provide an unsuitable and poor standard of accomodation for potential future residents, contrary to London Plan policies D5 (Inclusive Design), D7 (Accessible Housing), Local Plan 2033 policies LP1 (Design Quality) and LP7 (Housing Design) and the Mayors (GLA) Housing SPG.

The proposed development, by reason of poor layout and inadequate space would result in the provision of inadequate and unsuitable cycle parking. As such the proposed development is contrary to policies T1 (Strategic Approach to Transport), T4 (Assessing and Mitigating Transport Impacts) and T5 (Cycling) of the London Plan 2021, policies LP42 (Walking and Cycling) and LP43 (Transport and Development) of the Local Plan 2033 and the guidance contained within Hackney Transport Strategy.

Insufficient information has been submitted in regard to the impact of trees as a result of this application. The Local Planning Authority is therefore unable to fully assess the merits or otherwise of this proposal and its impact on the surrounding trees of amenity value.
